name: kukumo-vscode-extension
description: Editor and execution capabilities of Kukumo projects

kukumo.languageServer.connectionMode.description: How the LSP client should establish connection with the language server
enumDescriptions: Connect to an external language server using TCP
Executable an instance of the embedded language server as a Java process

kukumo.languageServer.TCPConnection.markdownDescription:
Host and port of the TCP connection host (only when `#kukumo.languageServer.connectionMode#` is `TCP Connection`).
 Example: `localhost:8090`

kukumo.languageServer.javaProcessPluginP.markdownDescription:
Local path of Kukumo plugins directory to be used by the embedded Java process (only when `#kukumo.languageServer.connectionMode#` is `Java Process`).
 Example: `/var/lib/kukumo/plugins`

kukumo.executionServer.URL.markdownDescription: URL of the Kukumo execution server

kukumo.executionServer.sharedWorkspace.markdownDescription:
Set whether the execution server can access to the current workspace directly.
When checked, the server will read the content from disk; otherwise, a copy of the whole workspace will be send via HTTP ***(not recommended for large projects)***

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
